messages:
Name: Kaan Ayhan
Nationality: Turkey
Date of Birth: November 10, 1994
Position: Defender
Current club: Sassuolo
Serie A clubs played for: Sassuolo

Sassuolo defender Kaan Ayhan has played in a strong number of the side's Serie A matches in 2022/2023, making 10 appearances overall and playing 540 minutes. He has been selected in the starting XI in five of these appearances across their 20 fixtures and been used off the bench as a substitute on five occasions.
The last Serie A match that Ayhan played came on November 12 for Sassuolo against Bologna; a meeting that he played 90 minutes in during a 3-0 defeat. He has been booked once.
In the side's next Serie A game on February 4, Sassuolo - who are in 16th place in the standings on 20 points - face a home match against Atalanta.
Ayhan played 23 Serie A games last season for Sassuolo and scored one goal.
Ayhan moved to Sassuolo in September 2020 from Fortuna Düsseldorf, for whom he made 113 league appearances in total, scoring eight goals and providing seven assists.

It was on September 20, 2020 that Ayhan made his competition debut, aged 25 years and 314 days, versus Cagliari. So far in his Serie A career, he has appeared 52 times in the competition, with one goal scored and he is yet to assist a team-mate.
